name: etapedaily
description: ## Overview EtapeDaily is a Slack bot designed to enhance the Tour de France viewing experience by providing daily, non-spoiler updates on race stages. It posts brief summaries including stage number, starting and ending locations in a dedicated Slack channel. Each post is intended to serve as the start of a thread where detailed discussions and spoilers are encouraged, allowing fans to engage freely without spoiling the experience for others in the main channel.
